text: AjpSample throws null pointer when you set the method to GET. This is due to the body field being null and never being populated when GET is selected.
creator: gcarter.mail@gmail.com

text:
Hello,
Can you attach a Test Plan showing the issue and the jmeter.log file ?

Thank you
